svg.desc: The chart shows different air pollutants in the period 2000 to 2014. In this period, levels of non-methane volatile organic compounds, nitrogen oxides, particulate matter and sulphur dioxide decreased. In the case of ammonia, the index increased from 103 to 109. The base year in which the index is set at 100 is 2005.

div.p:
Source: Umweltbundesamt 2015.
CC BY 4.0 Federal Government
